it.polimi.hegira.adapters

Class AbstractDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.hegira.adapters.AbstractDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cassandra, Datastore, Tables

    public abstract class AbstractDatabase
extends Object
implements Runnable

    • Method Summary

      boolean canMigrate(String tableName, int VDPid)
      Tells the SRC if it is allowed to migrate a given VDP for a given table.
      abstract void connect()
      Start a connection towards the database.
      abstract void disconnect()
      Disconnects and closes all connections to the database.

      Returns a list containing all the tables of the database.

      Template method Performs the switchOver in a virtually partitioned way.
      void updateVDPsCounters(Metamodel myModel)
      When migrated in a partitioned way, this method MUST be called by the TWC in order to report that an entity has been migrated.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public abstract void connect()
                      throws ConnectException
        Start a connection towards the database. Suggestion: To be called inside a try-finally block. Should always be disconnected
        Throws:
        ConnectException

      • disconnect

        public abstract void disconnect()
        Disconnects and closes all connections to the database. Suggestion: To be called inside a finally block

      • switchOver

        public final boolean switchOver(String component)
        Template method which performs the non-partitioned data migration.
        Parameters:
        component - A string representing the component, i.e. SRC or TWC
        Returns:
        true if the migration has completed successfully from the point of view of the component who called it.

      • switchOverPartitioned

        public final boolean switchOverPartitioned(String component,
                            boolean recover)
        Template method Performs the switchOver in a virtually partitioned way. The TWC part is unchanged with respect to the switchOver method.
        Parameters:
        component - The name of the component (i.e., SRC or TWC)
        recover - true if the migration should be recovered from the last successfully migrated VDP; false otherwise
        Returns:

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • canMigrate

        public boolean canMigrate(String tableName,
                 int VDPid)
                   throws Exception
        Tells the SRC if it is allowed to migrate a given VDP for a given table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the table to migrate.
        VDPid - The id of the VDP to be migrated.
        Returns:
        true if it is possible to migrate the given VDP, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        Exception - ZooKeeper exception

      • getTableList

        public abstract List<String> getTableList()
        Returns a list containing all the tables of the database.
        Returns:
        The list of tables.

      • updateVDPsCounters

        public void updateVDPsCounters(Metamodel myModel)
        When migrated in a partitioned way, this method MUST be called by the TWC in order to report that an entity has been migrated. The method updates the counters relative to the VDP that contains the entity.
        Parameters:
        myModel - The Metamodel entity.
